original_title: Doonya the Bollywood Workout: Abs, Glutes & Cardio
overview: Cardio & conditioning intervals, each activating major muscle of the abs, arms & legs. The energy of Bollywood music & dance will keep you smiling as you burn up to 800 calories while learning fitness fundamentals. Doonya is your happy workout.
title: Doonya the Bollywood Workout: Abs, Glutes & Cardio
